attributes.action: make  the use of P  plates compulsory for the first 12 months after passing ones driving test
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: this would help youngsters get more driving experience, and go some way to reducing the number of fatalities on our roads

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps several already in existence -
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/P-plate/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
